sn1.3:1.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.3:2.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward;
sn1.3:2.2: one led on to old age has no shelter.
sn1.3:2.4: do good deeds that bring you to joy.”
sn1.3:3.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward;
sn1.3:3.2: one led on to old age has no shelter.
sn1.3:3.4: a seeker of peace would drop the world’s bait.”
